Package org.eso.ias.kafkautils

package org.eso.ias.kafkautils
A collection of Kafka utilities.
Author:
acaproni
  • Class
    Description
    FilteredKafkaIasiosConsumer
    FilteredKafkaIasiosConsumer allows to set a custom filter on top of the Kafka consumer.
    FilteredKafkaIasiosConsumer.FilterIasValue
    The filter to apply to IASValues
    KafkaHelper
    A helper class providing useful methods and constants for Kafka
    KafkaIasiosConsumer
    Extends SimpleKafkaIasiosConsumer providing filtering by IDs and types.
    KafkaIasiosProducer
    KafkaIasioProducer writes IASValue in the kafka topic by delegating to SimpleStringProducer
    KafkaStringsConsumer
    A generic kafka consumer that forwards all the strings received in each message to the listener.
    KafkaStringsConsumer.StreamPosition
    The start position when connecting to a kafka topic for reading strings
    KafkaStringsConsumer.StringsConsumer
    The interface for the listener of strings
    KafkaUtilsException
    Exception retunrd by classes in KafkaUtils module
    SimpleKafkaIasiosConsumer
    KafkaIasiosConsumer gets the strings from the passed IASIO kafka topic from the KafkaStringsConsumer and forwards the IASIOs to the listener.
    SimpleKafkaIasiosConsumer.IasioListener
    The listener to be notified of Iasios read from the kafka topic.
    SimpleStringConsumer
    /** Generic Kafka consumer to get strings from a kafka topic.
    SimpleStringConsumer.KafkaConsumerListener
    The listener to be notified of strings read from the kafka topic.
    SimpleStringProducer
    SimpleStringProducer pushes strings on a Kafka topic.
